question: [Explain] Portugues: Informe which integer bin occurs most frequently com base no histograma.

qas.question: [Explain] Portugues: Informe which integer bin occurs most frequently com base no histograma.
[Calm] Deutsch: Gib how many samples were used in total anhand des Histogramms an.
[Challenge] English: State how many entries fall inside the modal bin based on the histogram.
